Quick search

abstack¶

class sharp_modules.abstack.abstack(file=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Class for absorption studies (find continuum sources, extract spectra, analyze spectra)

go()[source]¶

Executes stacking analysis

reset()[source]¶

Function to reset the current step and remove all generated data. Be careful! Deletes all data generated in this step!

show(showall=False)[source]¶

show: Prints the current settings of the pipeline. Only shows keywords, which are in the default config file default.cfg showall: Set to true if you want to see all current settings instead of only the ones from the current step
